title: Public media’s next act
description: Ten years ago, I left a dream job at NPR because I was worried about the public radio system’s digital transition — and whether it could survive as a publicly supported service in an increasingly partisan world. Today, the shit has hit the fan. The broadcast audience is shrinking. Membership is flat or falling. Sponsorship...
